item.title: Shannon add a quote by Lucille Ball
item.description: "The secret of staying young is to live honestly, eat slowly, and lie about your age." -- Lucille Ball

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Benjamin Franklin
item.description: "Trouble knocked at the door, but, hearing laughter, hurried away" -- Benjamin Franklin

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Lucille Ball
item.description: "I have an everyday religion that works for me. Love yourself first, and everything else falls into line." -- Lucille Ball

item.title: Shannon add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "If music be the food of love, play on, Give me excess of it; that surfeiting, The appetite may sicken, and so die." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Shannon add a quote by William Shakespeare
Shannon add a quote by Tom Clancy
item.description: "The difference between fiction and reality? Fiction has to make sense." -- Tom Clancy

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Douglas Adams
Shannon add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "If you have come to these pages for laughter, may you find it. If you are here to be offended, may your ire rise and your blood boil. If you seek an adventure, may this song sing you away to blissful escape. If you need to test or confirm your beliefs, may you reach comfortable conclusions. All books reveal perfection, by what they are or what they are not. May you find that which you seek, in these pages or outside them. May you find perfection, and know it by name." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Shannon add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "Ah! There is nothing like staying at home, for real comfort." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "I am a badass, and I recognize that you, too, are a badass." -- Cassandra Clare
